name: cart-clone
description: Cart is used for viewing all the items added to the cart, allows user to proceed to checkout.

imageSettings.description: Image settings for cart line item

pickUpAtStoreWithLocationText.comment: Text for pick up at store checkbox when location is specified

bopisSelectAStore.comment: Header for BOPIS (Buy Online Pickup In Store) dialog

orLabel.comment: The label that shows up between the guest checkout button and the signed-in checkout button, when the application is in an anonymous user state

outOfStockErrorMessageHeader.comment: Display text for Out of stock error message

outOfStockErrorMessage.comment: Display text for Out of stock error message
outOfStockErrorMessage.value: : This product is no longer available. Please remove it from the bag.

failToGetCartText.comment: Text for fail to get cart

cartRemoveButtonAriaLabel.comment: Aria label for the remove button

pickUpAtStoreText.comment: Text for pick up at store checkbox

waitingClass.comment: CSS class for the waiting class

decrementButtonAriaLabel.comment: Aria label for the quantity decrease button
decrementButtonAriaLabel.value: Press to decrease the quantity by 1

incrementButtonAriaLabel.comment: Aria label for the quantity increment button

inputQuantityAriaLabel.comment: Aria label for the input quantity

saveForLaterText.comment: string to save for later text

nameOfWishlist.comment: string for name of the wishlist

productDimensionTypeColor.comment: String that corresponds to the Color Product Dimension Type (1)

productDimensionTypeSize.comment: String that corresponds to the Size Product Dimension Type (3)

productDimensionTypeStyle.comment: String that corresponds to the Style Product Dimension Type (4)

productDimensionTypeConfiguration.comment: String that corresponds to the Style Product Dimension Configuration (2)

shipInsteadDisplayText.comment: String that corresponds to the ship instead display text

changeStoreDisplayText.comment: String that corresponds to the change store display text

quantityDisplayText.comment: String that corresponds to the quantity display text

shipToAddressDisplayText.comment: String that corresponds to the ship it to an address display text

pickItUpDisplayText.comment: String that corresponds to the pick it up display text

totalSavingsText.comment: String that corresponds to the total savings display text

minInventoryMessage.comment: String that corresponds to the Minimum inventory display text
minInventoryMessage.value: There is only {0} product left. Please choose quantity

originalPriceText.comment: String that corresponds to the original price screen reader text

currentPriceText.comment: String that corresponds to the current price screen reader text

cartLoadingErrorMessage.comment: String that corresponds to the error message that is shown when essential data actions fail
cartLoadingErrorMessage.value: Sorry we are unable to load your cart at this moment, please try again later.

totalSavings.comment: String associated with Total Savings display text

conditionsText.comment: String associated with Legal disclaimer for order total display text

yetToBeCalculatedText.comment: String associated with to be calculated display text

orderTotal.comment: String associated with order total line display text

notApplicationForCartOrderSummary.comment: String associated with order total line display text

backToShoppingButtonTitle.comment: Label for back to shopping button

addToWishlistButtonText.comment: Label for Move to wishlist button

removeFromWishlistButtonText.comment: Label for Remove from wishlist button

invalidPromoCodeErrorText.comment: To show invalid promo code message

failedToAddPromoCodeErrorText.comment: To show message on fail to add promo code

failedToRemovePromoCodeErrorText.comment: To show message on fail to add promo code

duplicatePromotionErrorText.comment: Text to be shown when adding a duplicate promotion code

storeSelector.description: Store Selector to use with the Find In Store component
